title: Plentiful abutting functional groups boosting sodium storage in a small molecule
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02835J, Paper
Chenyang Zhang, Cheng Fu, Haoyu Guo, Yuan Chen, Kun Fan, Zengyu Li, Jincheng Zou, Huichao Dai, Guoqun Zhang, Jing Ma, Chengliang Wang
A small molecule is reported to demonstrate that the abutting functional groups could enable high specific capacity, form chelation with sodium ions and present ionic intermolecular interactions, leading to insolubility and high cyclability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
